cards.title: Cure Wounds
cards.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Cure Wounds**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **female dragonborn druid** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: A creature the caster touch regains a number of hit points equal to + your spellcasting ability modifier.. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.

cards.title: Faerie Fire
cards.description: Create a 20ft cube of light that outlines objects & creatures, causing dim light for 10ft. Attacked creatures are visible & lose invisibility benefits. Attackers have advantage if they can see the outlined targets.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Faerie Fire**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **female dragonborn druid** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: Create a 20ft cube of light that outlines objects & creatures, causing dim light for 10ft.. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.

cards.title: Guidance
cards.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Guidance**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **female dragonborn druid** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: the caster touch one willing creature.. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.

cards.title: Produce Flame
cards.description: Create a flickering flame in your hand shedding bright light for 10ft. You can attack with it, dealing 1d8 fire damage to a creature within 30ft. Damage increases with levels.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Produce Flame**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **female dragonborn druid** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: Create a flickering flame in your hand shedding bright light for 10ft.. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.
